cvrfdoc.document_title: Red Hat Bug Fix Advisory: Red Hat Ansible Tower 3.3.5-3 - Container
cvrfdoc.document_distribution: Copyright Â© 2021 Red Hat, Inc. All rights reserved.

full_product_name.product_name: ansible-tower-container-3.3.5-3 as a component of Red Hat Ansible Tower 3.3 for RHEL 7 Server

branch.name: Red Hat Ansible Tower 3.3 for RHEL 7 Server

full_product_name.product_name: Red Hat Ansible Tower 3.3 for RHEL 7 Server

notes.note: Tower: credentials leaked through environment variables

reference.description: bz#1688508: CVE-2019-3869 Tower: credentials leaked through environment variables

remediation.description: For information on upgrading Ansible Tower, reference the Ansible Tower Upgrade and Migration Guide: https://docs.ansible.com/ansible-tower/latest/html/upgrade-migration-guide/index.html

acknowledgment.description: Red Hat would like to thank Chris Bertsch (FactSet Research Systems Inc) for reporting this issue.

note:
- Fixed an issue to no longer expose Tower service credentials to playbook  
runs via environment variables when running in OpenShift (CVE-2019-3869)
- Fixed the Notifications tab to properly appear when viewing a Job 
Template
